website_summaries.verdict: Both children and adults have a hard time resisting a cuddly porg. If you couldn't get enough of these guys in the movie, you'll love this toy.
pros: Makes authentic porg noises, flaps wings, and makes several different chirping sounds
It's enough to melt the heart of the most grown up Star Wars fan.Soft, cuddly fur
cons: You can hear the gears whirring while it moves

customer_reviews.title: Great fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Love this adorable toy! Purchased for my older teen son after commenting he wanted a porg when we were leaving the theater after watching Last Jedi! As to another buyer who was disappoint that her porg only made one sound and not the 3 as advertised...flip the toy over and move switch from “Try me” mode to “On” BTW his shitzu puppy loves the porg as well (cue the Chewbacca noise!)
customer_reviews.author: allison ellis

customer_reviews.title: My daughters “Baby poo poo owl”
customer_reviews.text: Cute Star Wars toy. My kids call them poo poo owls. It flaps its wings, moves its wings, mouth, and screeches when its tummy it pushed. My daughter plays with it like a baby doll daily and hasn’t needed batteries yet after 3 months. It seems like a nice quality toy, it has turned out to be a favorite.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness. I bought this on a pre-order not knowing what I would get. It is amazing! Very well made. The fur, face and wings look real. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: cartert9

customer_reviews.title: It's so darn cute 😂😂
customer_reviews.text: I love this thingI fell in love with the porgs and had to buy one. I was expecting a smaller product to be honest. I'm so excited over this little guy. For being an ac tiom plush it's softer than I was expecting. It's not as creepy as furbies. The only down side is you can kinda hear the movements of the mechanical parts. After it makes noise the mouth continue to moves. But I'd recommend it. It's a cute little thing. Size comparison to my kindle in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: svemm

customer_reviews.title: Cute! :O
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend and she loved it! I didn't fully read the product description and thought I was just buying a Porg plush. If you poke his belly his wings flap, mouth moves, and he makes movie noises. There's a switch on his butt you can use to set to off, on, or display mode. On gives different noises while display mode just does one noise. The thing is soft and fuzzy as well!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: The Porg for you!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a Porg, I think this is the one to get! The fur & features are a very nice quality----he makes 3 different sounds while opening/closing his mouth and flapping his wings. You can replace his batteries & turn him off too!
customer_reviews.author: Bene

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and true in depiction
customer_reviews.text: Very realistic depiction of the movie's Porgs (if that can be said about an imaginary creature). Adorable, with an expression hard to resist. Soft & cuddly too, despite the sound producing mechanism inside. The sounds are interesting but limited to two varieties; most of the time I turn the sounds off to conserve the batteries. I cannot provide information on the toy's durability when played with, since I bought it for myself! (I'm a big "kid" with some gray hairs, who loves the Star Wars universe & stories.)
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: What a cute molting mess of alien fluff!
customer_reviews.text: In theory, this should be an awesome toy. It felt soft and cuddly enough and its lifelike motions were just like the Porgs in the The Last Jedi. Unfortunately, the happy owner I had gifted it to soon found an interesting “feature” that is not widely advertised. These Porgs are year-round molters and they will shed their fur all over the place no matter how gentle you are in handling them. Ultimately, this was a huge drawback, so we did what was best for the little guy and sent this otherwise cute alien life form back to his home planet. Maybe next time his breeders will get this one detail right!
customer_reviews.author: Hifihedgehog

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the Star Wars fan! The sounds it makes are so cute. It makes three different sound effects and flaps it’s wings.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Got Mine From The Amazon Treasure Truck and LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit it. I geek out over all things Star Wars and this was no exception. I rushed to get mine when these popped up on the Amazon Treasure Truck at 15 bucks a pop. I was expecting a simple Porg plushie, and not a very big one either considering the low price. Imagine my surprise when it was about movie scale size AND had a push button that animates the Porg and emits a Porg sound effect! I love mine and it has the added bonus of driving my cats crazy. They can't decide whether to try and eat it or play with it.
customer_reviews.author: RRodriguez-Jackson

customer_reviews.title: At first I was disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am buying this as a gift for my grandson and had read on some of the reviews that the Porg they received only made one sound. I Wass disappointed at first because my Porg seemed to have only one sound too which was the warning screech. However, as I investigated further, there is a switch on the the battery compartment that control the sound: On, Off, and Display. Apparently it ships with the Display mode which does only have the one sound. However, by switching to ON, his vocabulary increases to the 3 sounds as advertised. I'm sure my grandson will be delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia K Mixer

customer_reviews.title: but the plushness of the faux fur is good quality. Not for little kids as there are ...
customer_reviews.text: Only makes three sound patterns. Got an opened or reused one as the ties for the feet were already cut off of the box otherwise would have given it a three. Wing and mouth movements are kinda cheesy, but the plushness of the faux fur is good quality. Not for little kids as there are too many breakable parts internally. More of a collectors item than a play toy.
customer_reviews.author: fairdrom

customer_reviews.title: A life-size porg! Make sure to change the switch to get more sounds!
customer_reviews.text: This adorable porg sits at my computer desk and nearly everyone who passes by wants to press its tummy so it moves and makes porg sounds! Everyone seems to love him--his giant eyes and perpetual frown are adorable. The only downside is a relatively loud motor whenever movement is engaged. It isn't a huge concern but it is quite noticeable! He's a LOT bigger than I expected! Make sure to change the setting on his plastic rear-end from "TRY ME" to "ON" to access the full bank of adorable sounds!
customer_reviews.author: J. Miltzer

customer_reviews.title: Not a snuggle toy
customer_reviews.text: My son likes star wars and he was so excited to get this, but it is advertised as a cute and cuddly toy, which it isn't. It does look a little cute, but the bottom part of the toy is round plastic, which makes it not able to snuggle with or it would be really awkward to try to snuggle. Nice toy to gift, makes 2 types of sounds, just be aware that despite the fact that it had fluffy fur, this is not for snuggling or cuddling!😊
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome. It makes my kid laugh and that’s what matters.
customer_reviews.text: My 8yo said it was the best gift ever. He is a lego snob and generally does not like anything but legos (he’s also autistic). This interacts with him and he loves on it. It’s really cool to see a kid who really dislikes affection cuddling this thing and sleeping with it lol such an awesome toy and I am really glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: KGeorge

customer_reviews.title: So darn cute
customer_reviews.text: I am 60 years old and love Porgs. Yep, I'm crazy. I brought this little guy to work and have him on my desk next to the ever full candy dish. People come by and once in awhile push his little 'try me' button and there is no way anyone can help but smile. He is so cute. I love this little guy. He has three distinct chirp recordings and his wings lift up and down as he chirps. I think he's just adorable. I love my little 'Me-Porg'.....
customer_reviews.author: Dani Boy Treasures

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and sure to delight any porg enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and sure to delight any porg enthusiast! This isn't as much of a "plush" since the whole bottom is hard plastic to support the battery compartment, and the center of porg is also slightly hard for the noise toggle. That being said, I appreciate that there is an "off" setting to make sure you don't accidentally set off the porg's noises if not wanted. Fair warning: My little dude ended up shedding A LOT, especially right out the box. (Running a lint roller over it actually seemed to help a lot.)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to our youngest kiddo for Xmas. Instant hit. It is cute, so that's got something going for it. Kinda freaked me out when I heard it being played with in the other room - thought an animal (other than our dog) got in (anyone seen "National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation"?).
customer_reviews.author: E. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for nerdy 26 y.o. boyfriends who are actually giant children
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend for Valentine's day as kind of a dorky gift, thought it might be funny/cute, didn't expect him to be super excited about it. He absolutely loved it, thought it was a cute gift, and now has it displayed in his room. He makes sure to play the porg sounds directly into the mic every time we voice chat. I am now deaf, have nightmares involving porgs, and their horribly annoying sounds echo through my thoughts every day. But my boyfriend loves it and that makes me happy!
customer_reviews.author: swebb

customer_reviews.title: Very cute Star Wars guy!
customer_reviews.text: This was an adorable gift for my Star Wars Loving 16 year old. Really fun to have him push on the wrapped gift, hear the sounds, and guess what it was. It was kind of a gag since he's 16, and I was looking for something cute for him, but he played with it with our dog all day, and put it on a bedroom shelf. It is really soft, and the mouth moves when he "talks". Very cute, and worth the money. PS They were in the last Star Wars movie.s
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J. Fuertes

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but odd
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my tween daughter. She loves cute things and feel in love with Porgs when she saw the movie. She appears to really enjoy this item, but I think the noises it makes are odd. One of the noises reminds me of an elephant call. The movements have a loud mechanical noise too (the wings move and the mouth opens). She likes it a lot. That is what is important.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I expected, kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence about getting this for my kids for Xmas. My kids like stuffed animals, but never really got into the ones that talk, etc. BUT, it has been a hit. They just like to press him every time they walk by. And adults out there - the sounds are super annoying!
customer_reviews.author: CRamon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth a penny.
customer_reviews.text: I love Star Wars and I thought it be amazing for my daughter who had been hinting for months she wanted one. The sound was unrealistic. Every movement the toy made sounded like a grind. Which of course drowned out the unrealistic noises that were being spewed. We returned after ordering an adorable plush.
customer_reviews.author: Eustace

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I was ready to wrap my daughter's present and noticed the sounds weren't working on her new Porg. Low and behold I open it up to check the batteries and there are none. Normally, no big deal, I have batteries, BUT there's also no battery cover!! It was packaged without a battery cover!! Needless to say, I'm very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Ann

customer_reviews.title: Lot's of fun
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my college age son who's a huge star wars fan and loves the new movie. He loves it. It's wings flap, it's mouth opens, it makes sounds, plus is soft and cuddly. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Jones

customer_reviews.title: So fluffy I could die
customer_reviews.text: In Try Me mode, he gets annoying FAST. In REAL mode, I actually think his sounds are pretty cute. We were able to score him from the Treasure Truck on Star Wars day, so he’s extra special to us but truly the kids would have been enamored with him even without our fun adventure to track the truck down. My almost two year old likes to half wrap him in a blanket and carry him as her baby while he makes his cute Porg noises.
customer_reviews.author: grlsmkbtrninjas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks the most like a porg compared to all the other plushes out there. Cute sounds :)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This Porg has held up to a 6-year-old's rough-and-tumble treatment... so far
customer_reviews.text: Got this off the Treasure Truck for a sweet lil kiddo who loves Star Wars. He turned 6 and we gave it to him for his birthday. He takes it a lot of places with him and already has put it through a bit of trauma, but it is still working! It's still making noise, the fur has been easy to wipe clean, and we think it'll hold up for at least a little while. I wouldn't advise letting toddlers throw it around, but it seems to stand up to a rough 6-year-old so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want, not other, the ugly one.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! I've seen other genuine porg toys that don't match the quality of this one. This is the fluffy, soft fur one. Others feel like a metal structure dressed in porg clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Guido Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Cute but screechy
customer_reviews.text: Cute to look at for sure, and I like the way the little wings flap and the mouth opens and closes. But the only sound it makes is the “screechy” Porg cry, it doesn’t make any nice little “coos” or anything else. Wish it had a full variety of Porg-speak.
customer_reviews.author: LegoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Porg Life
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty neat little plush toy. It doesn't do a whole lot - just a few different sound effects. My daughter enjoys it and I purchased on a lightning deal at a good price. I do wish it did a few more things, even if it might cost a bit more but I am satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. fifield

customer_reviews.title: Too Cute
customer_reviews.text: After seeing the new Star Wars movie I just had to get one of these. As soon as we came back from the movie I jumped onto Amazon to see if they had a stuffed version. It actually looks like one of my Scottish Fold cats with the big round eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Lemieux

customer_reviews.title: the one sample sound would be very annoying if that was all it could do
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old son adores his porg. Luckily, it makes three sounds from the movie... the one sample sound would be very annoying if that was all it could do.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: Scared my cat
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my cat because I thought she would love it - but it scared her. I didn’t want to return it because I thought it was so cute, so I put it on my kitchen counter to see if it would keep the cat off the counter and it worked! It’s now my counter cat deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: tealover

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my girl and she “died from cuteness ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my girl and she “died from cuteness overload”. Only issue is it’s a bit hard from the mechanical parts in it so it’s not something you can cuddle. Her words not mine lmao
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We got lots of cool points from her
customer_reviews.text: For my 10-year-old granddaughter who is obsessed with this creature. She loves it! We got lots of cool points from her. Works great. It makes a horribly annoying sound, which is apparently quite accurate. She adores this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie S. Horton

customer_reviews.title: My 3-1/2 year old son loves this and he hasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3-1/2 year old son loves this and he hasn't watched the movie yet. It's made very well and makes lots of different noises. I think the box suggests 5 and up, but my son is turning 4 in less than a couple of weeks and we haven't had any issues with him playing with it. So cute.
customer_reviews.author: Mammasan

customer_reviews.title: It's just as cute IRL as in pictures
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. This thing is so cute. It doesn't do much..squeeze its stomach and its wings flap and it makes some noises. Its fur is really soft and feels more realistic than most stuffed animals.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: It’s a hit! My daughter loves it and always ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a hit! My daughter loves it and always quick to correct those whom think Porg is an owl. Only wish you was more interactive, only makes one kind of noise, flaps arms up and down and moves beak. You keep hitting the button assuming it’s going to do something else.
customer_reviews.author: M3girlie

customer_reviews.title: Almost good enough to eat.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing. It does seem to be the most realistic-looking variant of the different Porg toys. Strangely endearing when it makes its plaintive cries.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: This is the cutest version of this toy that I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest version of this toy that I could find, and it also happens to be "life sized" and with sounds/actions. Exactly what I was looking for as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Meri K

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a star wars fan at all.....but my boyfriend is. After watching him laugh uncontrollably at a porg video, this was a must buy. He loves it. The cats love it. I hate it. It's a love/hate thing. Definitely brings enjoyment lol.
customer_reviews.author: rachel mcwatters

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, funny little thing.
customer_reviews.text: We love this overpriced, stupid little guy. My 5 year old thinks is absolutely hilarious, and carries it around like a little baby. We all have a good time with it. Appears to be much better in quality than other Star Wars toys we've purchased in the past.
customer_reviews.author: JillyBean

customer_reviews.title: The animatronics are pretty cool, although I don't know that I've heard ...
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is so cute! The animatronics are pretty cool, although I don't know that I've heard 3 different sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute, looks like in the movie, and makes sounds
customer_reviews.text: Cute, looks like in the movie, and makes sounds! It comes with the battery, too. Birthday gift for my Star Wars fan friend and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tung

customer_reviews.title: ... in law he is now running around with it like a 10 yr
customer_reviews.text: gift for son in law he is now running around with it like a 10 yr. old lol
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Theyre not loud and obnoxious like some toys can be
customer_reviews.text: Most aborable interactive Porg out there! Its very soft and makes a variety of cute noises. Theyre not loud and obnoxious like some toys can be, but has still captured the attention of my 2 1/2 year old. It flaps its wings and moves it mouth as well, in a fluid manner, not flighty. It arrived in less than a week. I also thought it was a great price. Walmart has a $40 Porg that is no where near as cute or soft as this one. Its also very annoying. Happy to have bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my dad because he liked the movie and likes penguins a lot so he ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad because he liked the movie and likes penguins a lot so he called this a space penguin and so I got it for him as a surprise and he loved it. 5 stars compared to the other model.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel g.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and annoying
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute plush that makes sounds and moves its wings... but if your kid really likes this and keep playing with it, you will be annoyed ;)
customer_reviews.author: AmazonDwellerTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift and my wife still enjoys it
customer_reviews.text: Got his for my wife at Christmas as a gag gift. She saw the Star Wars move advertisement and thought the Porg was cute. The toy offers 3 different talking sounds with a little movement after you press its belly. Not exactly like the movie Porg sounds but good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Barry

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as a prop for some of my Star Wars themed lessons for my students. Great size for what I needed him for, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cuddly Porg uses the "cute" side of the Force!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit with a young fan of the film - and the quality is so high that it looks like a prop from the movie! The sounds it makes when you squeeze it are the perfect touch. If you have a youngling who was charmed by the Porgs, they will love this.
customer_reviews.author: Gremlin75

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This things cute. Drives my dog nuts. It only seems to make two sounds though. Rated it a 4 for softness because there is a mechanical body inside but that's to be expected...
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Only makes one sound
customer_reviews.text: It’s really cute, but it doesn’t make more than one sound. You can also hear the mechanics in it moving, which shows that the quality isn’t the greatest. I am still debating if I am going to keep it or not.
customer_reviews.author: Vaelorn

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. My granddaughter fell in love with it when she saw it so I only got to keep it for a day. It's her best friend so I'm okay with that.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This porg is an awesome toy. It should keep smaller children occupied for a while and is just about the perfect gift for anyone interested in the lighter side of Star Wars.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna B

customer_reviews.title: Not super cuddly but very cute
customer_reviews.text: Not super cuddly but very cute! Comes with batteries and the interactive responses are great. P.S. It scares cats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Well Loved
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, well colored and so squishy! Only downside is it only makes one shrieking noise much to the delight of children.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B.

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not soft
customer_reviews.text: Made a great Christmas present for a young woman crazy about star wars. It would be much nicer if it was soft.
customer_reviews.author: Kathe

customer_reviews.title: he absolutely loved it. It's not super squishy because of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my boyfriend, he absolutely loved it. It's not super squishy because of the inside parts that make it move, but still really soft and full of cuddles. It seems to be made well, and has three patterns of noises it makes. If you or someone you know loves porgs, it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: Cute, not too noisy.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute Star Wars gift. When it's belly is pressed, it makes a cute noise and the wings flap. Reminds me a little of a Furby, but this one won't repeat what you say (which is a good thing). It has an on/off switch on the bottom and the batteries can be removed if you desire silence.
customer_reviews.author: Buckie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the cutest porg you can buy! Hes so soft and is hilarious to listen to. If you like porgs you definitely need to buy 1. Or 10.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Sooooooooo Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought two of these little guys. (Nerds) We LOOOVE them! We set them off together and its just like the movie! I highly recommend getting them in pairs or more. They really just have one long cry that they do, but it's fantastic. They flap their wings and move their mouths. Too cute!
customer_reviews.author: SlyBoots

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable! I love this little guy! It's soft and fluffy! It makes some pretty adorable noises too--it's just so cute! Being that it's obviously interactive and has a lot of internal stuff, it's not quite as squishy and huggable, but it's still adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Ash Paeth

customer_reviews.title: Fun for babies too.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 15 month old daughter and she loves carrying it around. It has stood up to her toddler abuse surprisingly well.
customer_reviews.author: A Prout

customer_reviews.title: It's cute
customer_reviews.text: It's very cute and fluffy feeling. I don't care for Star Wars but my husband made me watch it and I liked the Porg, so now we have this. lol
customer_reviews.author: Chad AddingtonTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun, but a Little Flat.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this product personally, and it’s great quality! The noises and motions tie in together splendidly! It’s was pretty soft, however the back ended up flat. That made the back feel hard. Although, after a few days it fluffed up to look perfect. Also, it starts with it’s own batteries, so you can see what I sounds like right in the box! Overall, a great product and a perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, and the fur is nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, and the fur is nice and soft. I'm not a huge fan of the animation and sounds, but they can be turned off easily.
customer_reviews.author: SummerLark

customer_reviews.title: How I appreciate this gift and listen to it often.
customer_reviews.text: One of the wonderful Christmas gifts from my Husband and I love it. It sits on my nightstand, along with the very small Porg I had purchased myself. Patricia
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Stone-TeStruth

customer_reviews.title: Almost life like.
customer_reviews.text: Moves, squawks like a real Porg. So soft, moves it's wings, and is just like on Star Wars.
customer_reviews.author: mothergoose10

customer_reviews.title: ITS SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: What I love most about this Porg is that it doesn't look cheap like the other brands. However, because of the motors and the voice box and battery compartment, it isn't very cuddlable.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: My Own Porg!
customer_reviews.text: After seeing the movie I wanted a Porg of my own. Of course, being a CGI creation, it was impossible to get a live one. This life-sized recreation is probably the next best thing and is cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Holly W

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not especially entertaining
customer_reviews.text: This toy is cute, but apparently, I am not young enough to appreciate its charm.
customer_reviews.author: Demaris H. Miller

customer_reviews.title: VERY well made!! :)
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeously made and very soft! I’m using it for a costume prop so I can do without the noises but my dog thinks the noises are interesting. Big enough to hug.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron Jourdan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it <3
customer_reviews.text: Omigosh i love this thing! The face, the sounds, the movements. Cutest thing ever. I mean it doesn’t look exactly like the porgs in the movie but still suuuper adorable.
customer_reviews.author: becki

customer_reviews.title: But it is cute and my kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I'd say interactive...you push the belly and it makes sounds and flaps its wings. That's it. But it is cute and my kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: You’re going to want to buy this for everyone you know :D
customer_reviews.text: This thing is just ridiculous!!! It’s hilarious and adorable and we know nothing about the movie but we love porgs!!! This little one is the best!! Love our porggie!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlover

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Sounds are awesome. Great for star wars fans. Made well too.
customer_reviews.author: Gside

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not huggable
customer_reviews.text: So cute. The sounds are adorable. Not "huggable" because of the soundbox I suppose. Body is hard. we have a lot of dolls that make moises and this is the only one that is rigid. The fur outside is soft though and it is a cute item.
customer_reviews.author: Sheash07

customer_reviews.title: Star wars
customer_reviews.text: This item is made of very material and was price low and shipping delivery was seamless
customer_reviews.author: John P. Pomales

customer_reviews.title: Great costume addition/toy
customer_reviews.text: This item was great, used as a part of my Chewbacca costume like a prior user and it was awesome. It's so soft, makes great sounds and it never died on me. This would be a good gift to any Star Wars lover too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking plushie, poor animotronics
customer_reviews.text: This was a holiday gift for my wife, a real Star Wars geek. She loves the look of the Porg, and it has nice fur. The movements and voice are cheap, choppy and too 'mechanical'.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: I got this on a whim and found it even more enjoyable than I thought it would be. There are three separate recordings. The wings flap and the mouth moves. It would be nice if the recordings were clearer but it’s on par with other toys like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Even during these covid times, I got this is fast - or normal amazon prime time. Product works and looks just as described. My son is very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: The 1980s called, it wants it’s technology back..
customer_reviews.text: The porg is cute and soft on the outside, but that is where the good points end. It’s 2018 not 1980, but this toy has loud mechanical sounds and horrifyingly bad sound recordings. Expected a lot better quality for the cost instead I got a cheaply made toy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindredheart

customer_reviews.title: Plushy but not cuddly
customer_reviews.text: Porg is wonderful. I wish he was a little softer around the middle. He's sort of like a Furby, in that he's a cute furry outside and plastic inside.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie byer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my porg
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my porg. Sounds confuse my cats and it is very huggable. Not just for over a plastic frame there is stuffing in between. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: PremiumSaltine

customer_reviews.title: Realistic enough.  Not as vigorous as I would like.
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Moves arms and squeals as advertised. May need new batteries. Operates a bit slow and the internal mechanical sounds compete with the realistic animal squeals.
customer_reviews.author: S. White

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids are in love with this Porg. I do wish the mouth movements actually coordinated with the sounds he makes. For the price, that seems like a reasonable detail to program in.
customer_reviews.author: SWegener

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Early May the 4th present for the wife, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent H. Leffler

customer_reviews.title: my daughters like it thought
customer_reviews.text: the mechanics are louder than the sounds. also I didn't remember the porgs bird sounds being so screeching. my daughters like it thought, just a bit overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved his so I got this for a gift and was happy to find it $10 cheaper than the one I got at target.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: SUPER CUTE
customer_reviews.text: super super super super cute porg! ordered it the moment i watched the movie and waited for 10 days for its arrival! Totally worth it. SUPER CUTE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hedge

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Porg!
customer_reviews.text: An Awesome Porg! Our Granddaughter saw the Star Wars Movie and this became a "must have it" for my Birthday. Cute and cuddly! Well made. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: This was mailed to grandkids as a gift. They love them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna W.

customer_reviews.title: Its cute
customer_reviews.text: Personally I wish it was fully plush, instead of mechanical and hard on the inside. But its still the cutest porg you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: I hate this thing and it haunts my life with its ugly eyes
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for my wife and she loves it. I don't get the appeal, but she's happy and that means it was worth it 👍
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Fan approved!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas and it was a total surprise for him! Porg is adorable and makes authentic noises! My younger son really wants one for himself now also. So glad I stumbled upon this guy while doing online shopping! Recommend to any Porg loving fans!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my son. It was awesome and works exactly as it said it would. Perfect toy for little kids as well as a nice souvenir for adults and older children who love Star Wars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: soft, furry, wish it had a motion sensor switch option. But it's fine just the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

product_meta.title: The Last Jedi: Life-Sized Interactive Action Porg Plush
product_meta.description: Introducing the newest iconic character from the Star Wars universe, porg. Action porg features moving wings head and mouth with three different porg phrases. Just push porg's adorable soft belly to start having fun with the most memorable characters from the Star Wars: the last Jedi. Super soft high quality fur. Comes with 3 AA batteries included. Do not machine wash. Packaging is and recyclable.
feature_bullets: Recommended for ages 3+: 3 AA batteries included
Features multiple "porg phrases" from the Star Wars: the last Jedi movie
This porg is soft yet durable, and makes a great gift for the ultimate Star Wars fan!
Porg's adorable wings flap, lips and head move while speaking "porg"
Inspired by the curious creatures from on ahch-to island in Star Wars: the last Jedi
